resources.string: Kickstart your day with a sprinkle of humor and a burst of laughter, only on Jokster!

In a world where stress and anxiety are becoming commonplace, a moment of laughter can be a precious escape. The "Jokester" app aims to be your daily source of joy and laughter. This app is designed to bring a smile to your face with a collection of the funniest jokes from around the world.
